doc.title: 'Fawlty Towers' @ 30
doc.plot: Fawlty Towers @ 30 is a series of short programmes designed to support the 30th anniversary of Fawlty Towers as a celebration weekend on UKTV Gold. The 'shorts' consist of specially-filmed interviews with actors, crew and fans intercut with clips from the original Fawlty Towers programmes and pay homage to the style and content of the original series'.
